directions: Pour the cream into a stand mixer.
Beat the cream on medium-high speed until it thickens and separates into butter and buttermilk.
Place the butter in a bowl and knead it with a wooden spoon to remove any remaining buttermilk.
Rinse the butter under cold water and knead it again to ensure all the buttermilk is removed.
Drain excess water and transfer the butter to a container.
Refrigerate the butter for at least 1 hour to firm it up before using.
